description:
This plugin will let you sign in using Discord's OAuth. Unlike other bubble plugins, this only accesses 2 scopes: "identify" and "guilds".

Once signed in through discord, you can access a user's information as well as get a list of the Discord guilds they are in.
name: Discord Connection
plugin_instructions:
Fill in Client ID and Client Secret
Use "Get data from an external API" to retrieve information
